sentences.sContent: No one else leant over her, and whispered soothing words to her, or was near enough to hear the flutter of her beating heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: No one else leant over her, and whispered soothing words to her, or was near enough to hear the flutter of her beating heart.
sentences.sCn: 没有其他任何人向她弯下身去，低声地对她说些安慰的话，或跟她挨得很近，可以听到她颤动的心房正在怦怦地跳动。

sentences.sContent: He offered soothing words about the value of the French model in the recession and its ability to protect the most vulnerable from poverty.
sentences.sContent_eng: He offered soothing words about the value of the French model in the recession and its ability to protect the most vulnerable from poverty.
sentences.sCn: 对于衰退中法兰西模式的价值，以及保护绝大多数易受伤害的贫困人口的能力，他给予了安慰。

synos.tran: 安慰；减轻痛苦（soothe的现在分词）
